mutants.original_line: return ''.join(sorted(''.join(ch.lower() for ch in string if ch.isalpha())))
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join(sorted(''.join((ch.lower() for ch in string if ch.isalpha()))))

mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(sorted('MUTATED'.join((ch.lower() for ch in string if ch.isalpha()))))
